participant_1.background:
I love spending time with my family, especially taking my son to the zoo to see koalas.
i love watching funny movies.
my two dogs are the best friends a girl could have.
I'm grateful for my health and the ability to work on my farm.
I filmed a documentary about a group of people who were following their dreams and it was an amazing experience.

participant_2.background:
I am a software engineer, but my true passion is geocaching.
i have problems chewing my food.
I am often in pain so I read to distract myself.
I ran my first 5k race with my spouse and child cheering me on.
i love the beatles.

content.text: I am a software engineer, but I really love geocaching.
That's cool! I've never heard of geocaching before.
It's a real life treasure hunt. People hide containers called geocaches and you use GPS to find them.
That sounds really fun! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a great way to explore your surroundings and meet new people.
I love exploring, so that sounds right up my alley.
I love spending time with my family, especially taking my son to the zoo to see koalas.
Koalas are so cute! I've always wanted to see one in person.
They are amazing! I love watching them eat eucalyptus leaves.
Me too! They're the best way to relax and have a good laugh.
I'm glad we have similar interests. We should get together sometime and go geocaching or watch a funny movie.
That sounds like a great idea! I'm free this weekend.
This weekend works for me too.
Perfect! We can meet up at the park and go geocaching.
